page.title: 04Euroroute A75
page.content:
The{A75 'Euroroute'}runs right through the middle of our area. It is a very busy road and is the main road from{Scotland}to{Ireland.}Because it is so busy there are plans to build a by-pass round Annan. We did a traffic survey on the A75 just one kilometre to the west of Annan and got the following results. In one hour between 2 and 3 o'clock on a Thursday afternoon the following traffic went past :
{Lorries : 108 {Vans : 54 {Cars : 412 {Buses : 11
Almost 600 vehicles in one hour. An A.A. man told us that on a busy day 6000 vehicles use this part of the road.
